extendedInfo.description: READY TO STEP BACK IN TIME and help destroy the ALIENS? An alien armada has invaded the skies and your 8-bit ship is the only thing that can save us. Come into our retro world of 8-bit aliens and help the fight the invasion in this classic style, endless shooting game. Can you survive long enough to become the GENERAL? * FEATURES * - Exciting gameplay that gets more fast and furious - Ultra tight controls - Shoot or dodge the 8-bit Aliens - Multiple characters to unlock (inc. super-shot General!) - Game Center integration - Stunning theme music and sound effects! - Ever-changing gameplay â never the same game twice Game On!

reviews.title: Nice concept... but do not download.
reviews.comment: But this is probably the worst game I have ever played. Glitchy controls, glitchy graphics, pop-ups after each gameplay, and ads. That they want money for this to remove ads is ridiculous. Crashed unexpectedly during gameplay twice. Zero stars if I could give them!
reviews.author: Maria Belan
